description: From a series of ten woodcuts for Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920; woman in black v-neck shirt in lower left of image faces viewer; behind her in the upper right corner a man dressed in black with his arms out in front of him takes a step on a road/path toward the woman in the foreground
portfolio: From Plate 8 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920
title: For the Eighth Scene, Plate 8 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission)
